page.title: 07Family life in Fauldhouse
page.content: Benhar Road . By the time I get back it is tea time.My sister and I play{Cluedo. Cluedo is a murder game and you have to find out who killed who, where and what with.{Draughts }is a game similar to{checkers} the board has got checked squares on it. You have to jump the other peoples markers. After that I get washed and I then watch the television. About 10:00p.m I am told that it is time for bed.But my parent's and sister sit up and discuss thing's like jobs for my sister Caroline. My mum tidies round about for my niece coming in the morning. My dad locks up then puts the fireguard up. My mum switches of the television , pulls out the plug and turns off the light then they all go to bed.
